creator: Allergan, Inc.
descriptionHtml: Brilliant Distinctions® is a consumer loyalty program that rewards its members with savings for purchasing qualifying Allergan treatments and products. Rewards can be redeemed for savings on future treatments and products with any participating Brilliant Distinctions® Provider. You’ll also receive access to special offers and promotions just for being a member! And with membership tiers, the more you earn, the more you save.

title: Brilliant Distinctions®

creator: Allergan, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Access all that Allē offers with the free app.

Allē is the premier aesthetics loyalty program from Allergan Aesthetics, giving you exclusive offers, treatment information, personalized rewards, and more.

Allē replaced Brilliant Distinctions® in 2020. Still a Brilliant Distinctions® member? Don’t leave your points behind. Download the app to easily upgrade your existing account to Allē.

Are you already an Allē Member? Access and redeem points directly from the Allē app. Not a Member yet? Simply download the app to create a new account in a few simple steps.

With the Allē app, you can:
• Create an account or upgrade your Brilliant Distinctions® account to Allē
• Browse your personalized offers from the palm of your hand
• Read up on the latest in aesthetic treatments
• Access your Wallet of points and rewards in a few taps

Now, let’s see what’s inside:

REGISTRATION
• Step-by-step registration directly from the Allē app
• Simple transfer of existing Brilliant Distinctions® account (including points, rewards, gift cards, and account information) to Allē
• Easy account creation for non-Brilliant Distinctions® members—directly from your phone

HOME
• Information on aesthetic products and treatments
• Treatment guides on your favorite Allergan Aesthetics brands
• Alerts for upcoming treatments

WALLET
• Your Allē points
• Rewards you’ve earned
• Exclusive offers
• Your treatment transaction history
• Membership status
• Gift cards

PROFILE
• Access all your information—with just one, simple tap
• Convenient, easy-to-use FaceID/TouchID

The Allē app makes it easier than ever to manage your aesthetics rewards. It’s all just a tap away. Download today.

Instagram: @Alle
Facebook: @Alle
descriptionShort: Enjoy easy access to your points, offers, and curated content with the Allē app

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Brilliant Distinctions® app is now the Allē℠ app. Here are some of the new features:
• New, easy-to-use navigation between Home, Wallet, and Profile
• User-friendly account registration
• Comprehensive, real-time feed filled with articles, treatment guides, exclusive offers and more—inside the Home section
• Convenient Wallet for easy access to points, gift cards, rewards, and transaction history

title: Allē

creator: Allergan, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Allē is your go-to app for your aesthetic needs, giving you access to curated content, treatment information, exclusive offers, and your Allē Wallet.

With Allē, you can earn and save on aesthetic products and treatments at your participating provider.

Allē’s app gives you access to all that Allē offers, including Allē Flash, which enables you to scan for a surprise offer while at your provider’s office.

Simply log in to your Allē Account within the app and you’re all set. Or, download the app and create a new account in a few simple steps.

Now, let’s see what’s inside. With the Allē app, you can:

Scan for Surprise Savings In-Office:
Earn a surprise offer at your Allē provider’s office. Just scan the Allē Flash QR code when you arrive, and you may receive an additional offer that can be redeemed instantly.

Browse Offers from the Palm of your Hand:
Take advantage of exclusive offers for Allē Members that you can redeem right away.

Read up on the Latest in Aesthetic Treatments:
Learn about products and treatments that might be right for you. Search for Allē treatments and browse educational articles within the app.

Access your Wallet in a Few Taps:
Check your point balance and your membership status, view your transaction history, available offers, and more.

Purchase and Send Gift Cards to other Allē Members:
Never worry about losing a gift card again. Allē’s digital gift cards are added directly to your Wallet upon purchase and can be easily gifted to other Allē Members.

The Allē app makes it easier than ever to manage your aesthetics rewards. It’s all just a tap away. Download today.

creator: Allergan, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Allē is your go-to app for your aesthetic needs, giving you access to curated content, treatment information, exclusive offers, and your Allē Wallet.

With Allē, you can earn and save on aesthetic products and treatments at your participating provider.

Allē’s app gives you access to all that Allē offers, including Allē Flash, which enables you to scan for a surprise offer while at your provider’s office.

Simply log in to your Allē Account within the app and you’re all set. Or, download the app and create a new account in a few simple steps.

Now, let’s see what’s inside. With the Allē app, you can:

Scan for Surprise Savings In-Office:
Earn a surprise offer at your Allē provider’s office. Just scan the Allē Flash QR code when you arrive, and you may receive an additional offer that can be redeemed instantly.

Browse Offers from the Palm of your Hand:
Take advantage of exclusive offers for Allē Members that you can redeem right away.

Read up on the Latest in Aesthetic Treatments:
Learn about products and treatments that might be right for you. Search for Allē treatments and browse educational articles within the app.

Access your Wallet in a Few Taps:
Check your point balance and your membership status, view your transaction history, available offers, and more.

Purchase and Send Gift Cards to other Allē Members:
Never worry about losing a gift card again. Allē’s digital gift cards are added directly to your Wallet upon purchase and can be easily gifted to other Allē Members.

The Allē app makes it easier than ever to manage your aesthetics rewards. It’s all just a tap away. Download today.

Allē is your go-to app for your aesthetic needs, giving you access to curated content, treatment information, exclusive offers, and your Allē Wallet.

With Allē, you can earn and save on aesthetic products and treatments at your participating provider.

Allē’s app gives you access to all that Allē offers, including Allē Flash, which enables you to scan for a surprise offer while at your provider’s office.

Simply log in to your Allē Account within the app and you’re all set. Or, download the app and create a new account in a few simple steps.

Now, let’s see what’s inside. With the Allē app, you can:

Scan for Surprise Savings In-Office:
Earn a surprise offer at your Allē provider’s office. Just scan the Allē Flash QR code when you arrive, and you may receive an additional offer that can be redeemed instantly.

Browse Offers from the Palm of your Hand:
Take advantage of exclusive offers for Allē Members that you can redeem right away.

Read up on the Latest in Aesthetic Treatments:
Learn about products and treatments that might be right for you. Search for Allē treatments and browse educational articles within the app.

Access your Wallet in a Few Taps:
Check your point balance and your membership status, view your transaction history, available offers, and more.

Purchase and Send Gift Cards to other Allē Members:
Never worry about losing a gift card again. Allē’s digital gift cards are added directly to your Wallet upon purchase and can be easily gifted to other Allē Members.

The Allē app makes it easier than ever to manage your aesthetics rewards. It’s all just a tap away. Download today.

Allē’s app gives you access to all that Allē offers, including Allē Flash, which enables you to scan for a surprise offer while at your provider’s office.

Simply log in to your Allē Account within the app and you’re all set. Or, download the app and create a new account in a few simple steps.

Now, let’s see what’s inside. With the Allē app, you can:

Scan for Surprise Savings In-Office:
Earn a surprise offer at your Allē provider’s office. Just scan the Allē Flash QR code when you arrive, and you may receive an additional offer that can be redeemed instantly.

Browse Offers from the Palm of your Hand:
Take advantage of exclusive offers for Allē Members that you can redeem right away.

Read up on the Latest in Aesthetic Treatments:
Learn about products and treatments that might be right for you. Search for Allē treatments and browse educational articles within the app.

Access your Wallet in a Few Taps:
Check your point balance and your membership status, view your transaction history, available offers, and more.

Purchase and Send Gift Cards to other Allē Members:
Never worry about losing a gift card again. Allē’s digital gift cards are added directly to your Wallet upon purchase and can be easily gifted to other Allē Members.

The Allē app makes it easier than ever to manage your aesthetics rewards. It’s all just a tap away. Download today.
